title: Elias in Prison (2x12)
author: Person of Interest Highlights
comment: Elias was the best supporting character
The best part was Elias mentioning his chess games with Harold.

See that guy over there?

Hey you want us to kill him??
Second best character in the show only to Fitch.
description:
Elias and John reunite in prison after John is incarcerated in by agent Donnelly
